source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 474,288 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 219,405.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

item.name: Eternal Talons of the August Acolyte

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Talons of the August Acolyte

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.6 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 927,918 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Loamm Niffen Tabard
description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
